name: More Dark Fables from Aesop
overview: More Dark Fables from Aesop is the sequel to The Dark Fables of Aesop and includes 12 new tales from the ancient Greek storyteller Æsop. The stories are narrated by famous actor Danny Glover with music by Ron Carter. The stories are shown with illustrations and animations. Many of the illustrations can be turned into sliding puzzles. There are three difficulty levels for these puzzles.
